Package com.luismarques99.productbuysapi.services

Class DatabaseDetailService

java.lang.Object
com.luismarques99.productbuysapi.services.DatabaseDetailService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DetailService
@Service public class DatabaseDetailService extends Object implements DetailService
Class that represents the implementation of the Detail Service that uses a database as the datasource.
Author:
Luis Marques
